title: Investly
summary: Investly is a secure, investor-facing platform built to simplify real estate investment in Canada. I contributed full-stack development using React and Next.js, with a focus on accessibility, responsive design, and dynamic content management. Optimized for SEO and performance, this platform emphasizes user trust and clarity — skills essential for modern fintech applications.

title: 412 Studios
summary: 412 Studios is a full-stack ecommerce and service platform tailored for creative professionals. Built using Next.js, Tailwind, Supabase, Stripe, and Prisma, I engineered a seamless user experience from sign-up to checkout. This project demonstrates my capability to handle authentication (via Kinde), 3D integration (Three.js), and scalable, maintainable code — all essential in high-performance product-driven environments.

title: RBCx
summary: RBCx is the innovation and tech ecosystem arm of RBC. While collaborating with Interad, I supported RBCx in delivering frontend experiences that align with enterprise accessibility standards and visual consistency. Utilizing React, Vue, and Git-based workflows, I contributed to high-scale financial interfaces that prioritized security, usability, and maintainability — aligning with the expectations of large-scale enterprise clients.

title: Fidelity Careers
summary: I collaborated with Interad to deliver enhancements to Fidelity Careers Canada's web platform, focusing on recruitment user journeys, SEO strategy, and performance optimization. Using Vue and React, I improved accessibility, responsive layout, and load speed — core competencies for HR-tech platforms. This project reflects my ability to work with marketing and recruitment teams to improve digital talent funnels.
